name: komodo
description: Komodo is a modern web based status page and incident management platform. It allows teams to display service health, schedule maintenance and communicate outages, running fully self hosted for privacy conscious organizations.
features: Status Pages: Public-facing status pages showing service health and uptime. Keep users informed about availability.
Incident Management: Create, update, and resolve incidents with timeline tracking. Manage outages transparently.
Maintenance Scheduling: Schedule and communicate planned maintenance windows. Set user expectations proactively.
Service Monitoring: Monitor services with health checks and uptime tracking. Detect issues automatically.
Component Groups: Organize services into logical groups and categories. Structure status page clearly.
Subscriber Notifications: Email and webhook notifications for incidents and updates. Alert stakeholders automatically.
Custom Branding: Customize status page appearance with logos and colors. Match your brand identity.
Historical Data: View incident history and uptime statistics over time. Track reliability trends.
Multi-Language: Support for multiple languages on status pages. Serve international audiences.
API Access: Programmatic incident management and status updates. Automate status communication.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over status page infrastructure and data. Own your communication platform.
Metrics Display: Show response times and performance metrics on status page. Provide transparency beyond uptime.
